insert into sim_quotes (id, reference_no, customer_id, customer_name, date, user, note, total, total_tax, grand_total, user_id, shipping, order_discount_id, total_discount, company_id, expiry_date, status, product_discount, order_discount, product_tax, order_tax_id, order_tax, company_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{referenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{grandTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shipping,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderDiscountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderTaxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sim_quotes set reference_no = #{referenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_tax = #{totalTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, grand_total = #{grandTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping = #{shipping,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_discount_id = #{orderDiscountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_discount = #{totalDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_discount = #{productDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_discount = #{orderDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_tax = #{productTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_tax_id = #{orderTaxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_tax = #{orderTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, reference_no, customer_id, customer_name, date, user, note, total, total_tax, grand_total, user_id, shipping, order_discount_id, total_discount, company_id, expiry_date, status, product_discount, order_discount, product_tax, order_tax_id, order_tax, company_name from sim_quotes where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
